channel.title: NMS:SOFI on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NMS:SOFI on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: SoFi Shares Tumble in Wake of $1.5 Billion Stock Offering
item.description: SoFi Technologies Inc. dropped in late trading Tuesday, mostly wiping out earlier gains, after the provider of consumer financial services said it’s selling $1.5 billion of stock.
